articles.title: Ego Nwodim leaves ‘Saturday Night Live,’ which adds 5 new cast members
articles.description:
Devon Walker, Emil Wakim and Michael Longfellow confirmed last month on their social media accounts that they are leaving the show.

The post Ego Nwodim leaves ‘Saturday Night Live,’ which adds 5 new cast members appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ego Nwodim departs from 'Saturday Night Live' after the recent season.
Devon Walker, Emil Wakim, and Michael Longfellow also confirmed their exits last month.
Five new cast members will join SNL, impacting Boston's entertainment scene.
